definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Objective To study the structure of the scale of college students gratitude .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大學生感戴量表的因素結構。

sentences.english: Then, development and recension of the questionnaires.
sentences.chinese: 其次，量表的開發與修訂。

sentences.english: Mathematical model of space robots based on twist denotations is deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推導了旋量表示的空間機器人數學模型。

sentences.english: In addition, the design method of hardware and software of micro energy lose heat meter are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了熱量表微功耗軟硬件設計思想及方法。

sentences.english: Athens insomnia scale were used to assess preoperative sleep situation of the patients.
sentences.chinese: 採用阿森斯失眠量表評估患者術前睡眠情況。

sentences.english: Next, the attachment is a Stock Table for today's black and navy blue 205.
sentences.chinese: 附件是205黑色和藏青色今天的庫量表。

sentences.english: Basic in-line liquid flow rate meters are also available in bi-directional and reverse flow versions.
sentences.chinese: 基本線液體流量表也可在雙向和反向流動的版本。

sentences.english: The major instruments administered were Death Attitude Profile (OAF).
sentences.chinese: 以死亡態度量表做爲蒐集資料的主要工具。

sentences.english: The reliabilities and validities of the MHSI-C were examined using Pearson's correlations and factor analysis.
sentences.chinese: 用相關分析和因素分析考查量表的信度和效度。

sentences.english: The incidence of behavioral problem and score of SASC in EG were higher than that of CG.
sentences.chinese: 行爲問題發生率及社交焦慮量表分高於對照組。

sentences.english: Migrant worker's Health Related Quality of Life is evaluated by NHP.
sentences.chinese: NHP量表評價農民工人羣的健康相關生命質量。

sentences.english: The reliability and validity of the scale was good.
sentences.chinese: 該量表具有良好的信度和效度。

sentences.english: The primitive score of examination were converted to equivalent scale score and memory quotient.
sentences.chinese: 檢查的原始分換算成等值量表分及記憶商。

sentences.english: The score of the scales mentioned above and the major symptoms were evaluated again one week after the course of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 療程結束後1周再進行上述量表評分和主要症狀分級。

sentences.english: The Intelligence scale of cognizing person for college students has good reliability and validity.
sentences.chinese: 自編《大學生知人智力量表》具有較好的信度和效度。

sentences.english: Acceptability was evaluated by average scale-assessing time. Results: 1.
sentences.chinese: 測定各量表的平均評分時間進行可操作性評定。

definition: see 阿斯佩爾格爾|阿斯佩尔格尔[A1 si1 pei4 er3 ge2 er3]
